name: HealthAgent
description: HIPAA-compliant agent that synthesizes HealthKit data for clinical review.

capabilities.name: ClinicalSync
capabilities.description: Fetches FHIR records and Vitals using HKAnchoredObjectQuery.

capabilities.name: VoiceBriefing
capabilities.description: ElevenLabs-powered summary for doctors to hear patient status 'eyes-free'.
